title: Palaeontologia Sinica, Series C
additional-notes: This is a Chinese publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.

This is a monographic series.  Before concluding an issue is in the public domain, search for book renewals for the issue under its distinctive title. We have not systematically searched individual issue titles.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Felice Gollotti for copyright research on this title.
